dialogue.introduction: I'm the girl who took a diet and became an aircraft carrier, Chitose. I even got faster. Maybe I should write a book about it.
dialogue.library_intro: Renovated from a seaplane carrier to a carrier, I'm Chitose. Slimming down my body by dieting. My legs even became faster. This will let me play a part in the Task Force! I'll do my best for you!
dialogue.secretary2: Isn't it great, this flightdeck? It's my favorite.
dialogue.secretary3: Admiral, I don't recall saying it was okay to touch.
dialogue.secretaryidle: There is no fleet action scheduled for a while. Before the next operation, I'm going to deal with many of trivial things that may bother you in the future. Admiral, drink sake if you like, and please make yourself at home. (Kai Ni)
dialogue.secretarymarried: The Admiral is always doing his utmost best. It's okay. I understand.
dialogue.wedding: Thank you for always looking out for the reborn Chitose, Admiral.
dialogue.equipment1: I wonder if Chiyoda has gotten stronger.
dialogue.equipment2: No way, I might actually be cool.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Man, that's gonna leave a mark... Chiyoda will worry, so let's keep it a secret, yeah?
dialogue.docking_complete: Repairs are over, the cans are over there. (Kai Ni)
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has been completed.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned to the home port.
dialogue.air_battle: I hope this isn't like the Philippine Sea...
dialogue.attack: Fellow planes, go get 'em! /or/ First attack wave, take off!
dialogue.mvp: Chiyoda's gonna yell "Don't get too cocky" at me, so let's keep quiet about this.
dialogue.minor_damaged2: I won't let you hit my flight deck!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Ah man, my precious flight deck...
dialogue.sunk: Chiyoda... I leave the rest... to you...
dialogue.fall_2015: Chiyoda, just because the roasted/baked sweet potato is delicious, don't eat too much or you'll become fat. Look, the admiral's watching!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral, Christmas is fun! Hey, Chiyoda. You can't eat too much. Ufufu.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: It's the year end already. The whole year moves so fast, doesn't it. I need to prepare for the New Year. Chiyoda, help me out.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, a happy New Year! Please take care of Chiyoda and me this year as well!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's Setsubun, Admiral. The demon is... Umm... Chiyoda, do you want to be the demon for Setsubun?
dialogue.valentines_day_2016: Admiral, Chitose will give you some chocolate...It's a little bitter because I wanted to give it an adult taste, ufufu.

hourly.0000: 12 midnight. Together with the Admiral, I watched the day tick over! *giggle*
hourly.0100: It's 1 A.M. Ah, somehow I'm uneasy... perhaps Chiyoda is mad?
hourly.0200: It's 2 A.M. Being the timekeeper, it's a bit rough, you know...
hourly.0300: It's 3 A.M. Just as a nightcap, would you like something to drink?
hourly.0400: 4 A.M. I wonder if Chiyoda is sleeping well...
hourly.0500: 5 A.M. Admiral, the daily quests have renewed. Let's clear them out together!
hourly.0600: zzz... haa... Ah! 6 A.M. Admiral! Sorry! I borrowed your lap for a bit.
hourly.0700: 7 A.M. Daybreak sure is refreshing. Good morning.
hourly.0800: It's 8 A.M. Thanks to the Admiral, I was able to sleep well last night.
hourly.0900: 9 A.M. For me, it's too early to be drinking or to be sober. *giggle*
hourly.1000: 10 A.M. Today's maneuvers, what are you considering?
hourly.1100: 11 A.M. For lunch, what do you want to do?
hourly.1200: 12 midday, it's lunch time, no? On a hill overlooking the port, even a bento is great!
hourly.1300: It's 1 P.M. With the Admiral, even a convenience bento is great. *giggle* How lovely!
hourly.1400: It's 2 P.M. Ah.. Admiral, I see Chiyoda over there! He~y Chiyoda~?
hourly.1500: It's 3 P.M. Oh my? Chiyoda, she ran away all angry. I wonder why~?
hourly.1600: It's 4 P.M. Admiral, this evening's maneuvers, what are you considering?
hourly.1700: 5 P.M. Such a beautiful twilight, isn't it?
hourly.1900: 7 P.M. Just time for dinner, no? How about we go to Houshou's?
hourly.2000: 8 P.M. Admiral, how about taking your time in a bath today?
hourly.2100: 9 P.M. Admiral, the bath is.... going together is impossible!
hourly.2200: 10 P.M. Oh my, what is it Chiyoda? It's all right, I'm not bothering the Admiral. Don't worry.
hourly.2300: 11 P.M. Admiral, staying up late every day is bad. Go to bed early today...
